message_1:
A delivery service has to deliver packages to five different locations. The distances (in miles) between the locations are as follows:
- Location 1 to Location 2: 10
- Location 1 to Location 3: 8
- Location 1 to Location 4: 12
- Location 1 to Location 5: 14
- Location 2 to Location 3: 5
- Location 2 to Location 4: 8
- Location 2 to Location 5: 9
- Location 3 to Location 4: 6
- Location 3 to Location 5: 7
- Location 4 to Location 5: 5

What is the shortest route that the delivery service can take to deliver all packages and return to the starting point (Location 1)? What is the distance of this route?
